title: Indonesian munching nasi goreng
ingredients: ['380g brown rice', '1 to 2 tablespoons roasted peanuts', '1 pinch white pepper', '1 clove garlic, roughly chopped', '2 large shallots, roughly chopped', '2 large tomatoes, halved', '1 to 2 red chillies, roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1 tablespoon dark or light soya sauce', '100g white or Chinese cabbage', '1 red onion', '1 carrot', '1 to 2 teaspoons coconut oil', '225g baby prawns, defrosted', '4 eggs (1 per person)', 'chopped fresh tomato, to garnish', 'chopped fresh coriander, to garnish']
